channel.title: Need Help

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @CripScape_Jeff CripScape Jeff
item.description:
@CripScape_Jeff wrote:

try this for compiler…

@echo off
title CripScape Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

and this for run server

@echo off
color 0a
title CripScape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

and if this aint working then you dont have the right java

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @pr0stbeef pr0stbeef
item.description:
@pr0stbeef wrote:

Need help, I have several servers all of which won’t run or compile. I recently got a new computer because my other crashed, so I can’t really remember how to rework it so i can run and compile. I do remember that you edit run.bat and paste in a different setting, heres the current one for run.bat and compile on a server called Bandos Isle V3

RunServer:

@echo off
color 0b
title EasyScape Server
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Compiler:

@echo off
title Compiling…
“E:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe” *.java
title LordScape - compile completed.
pause

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Read full topic
